## Source: amazon-inspector (b2d3a9c35af8fd074327c2b67262963aa30c1d92abbee4132456ef354f51140e)
The package escaux-scrumboard-api was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (2abae408922caa16c739134980297033d10a17b42b1ee60f80b53c471ea0d9a5)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'escaux-scrumboard-api' @ 999.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
